# f5distributedcloud_cloud_site (Data Source)

The `f5distributedcloud_cloud_site` data source retrieves information about an existing cloud site.

## Example Usage

```hcl
data "f5distributedcloud_cloud_site" "example" {
  name      = "my-cloud-site"
  namespace = "system"
}

output "site_state" {
  value = data.f5distributedcloud_cloud_site.example.site_state
}
```



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the cloud site to look up.
- `namespace` (String) Namespace where the cloud site is located.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the cloud site.
- `id` (String) Unique identifier of the cloud site.
- `site_state` (String) State of the site (ONLINE, OFFLINE, etc.).
